page.title: 17 Living on Longhill Estate
page.content:
Mr and Mrs Glenton live in Parkhurst Close on Longhill Estate. They moved into the{house}when it was first built 31 years ago. Before that they lived in a big old flat on Hessle Road. They have seen the area change over the years. When they first moved the rent was 24s (Â£1.40). Now it is about Â£20 per week, but in 1982 they bought their{house}from the Council. When the estate was first built Holderness High Road was only a single carriage-way. To reach it from Longhill you had to cross a ditch by walking along a plank. There were few grassed areas, not many trees, and no proper pavements. Mrs Glenton remembers that she had to buy from mobile shops which came round the estate.
